name: Kid-doMultiplication-TimesTableLearningSkill
0:
”Alexa, start Table Robo”
”Alexa, open Table Robo”
”Alexa, launch Table Robo”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: table robo
des:
Kid-do Multiplication is a fun based multiplication learning skill for children of all ages, particularly those from 3 to 12 years.

Skill provides features for learning, practicing and testing the time table or multiplication skills.

Skill will start by using any of the following phrases.
 
'Alexa, start Table Robo'
'Alexa, open Table Robo' 
'Alexa, launch Table Robo'

Skill will ask user to select the mode i.e. Learn / Practice / Test.

In learning mode, Alexa shall recite the times table for any chosen number from amongst 1 to 20.
 
In Practice mode, Alexa shall ask times table for any chosen number from amongst 1 to 20. Alexa shall offer help when asked. Also Alexa shall automatically provide the correct response when repeated mistakes are made.

In testing mode, Alexa shall ask user to select a difficulty level from 1 till 5. Lower difficulty levels are suitable for relatively junior students and higher levels for senior students. Test shall comprise of 10 questions being asked one after the other.

Best of Luck Kid! Good fun and great learning to you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
